data.title: Winds Anarchy | 1.7.2 - 1.20.3
data.description1:
A 1.20.3 Minecraft Anarchy Server
Focusing on High Quality Survival Experience
data.description2: No Rules, Original Map, Not 2b2t Map, More Challenging. Limit Flight & Timer Properly, Remove Illegal Items.
data.description3: No Queue, No Whitelist, No Online Mode, No Dupe Fix, No Redstone Limit, No Power Abuse. Allow all characters as username, and bedrock version support.
data.description4: Powered by high performance Host, multiple BGP for disaster recovery. Professional highly optimized, Always keep TPS 19-20 with lower mspt. =w=
data.description5: We have years of experience in DevOps. When bug is found, we will provide a solution in 5 minutes and fix it. Owner is cute, Welcome to contact us~ UwU
